casebody.data:
No. 331,

Misc.

Collier v. United States. Petitioner pro se. Acting Solicitor General Spritzer, Assistant Attorney General Vinson, Beatrice Rosenberg and Julia P. Cooper for the United States.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus denied. Treating the papers submitted as a petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit, certiorari is granted. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. The case is transferred to the appellate docket.
